channel.title: June2025 on LRG
channel.description: Recent content in June2025 on LRG

item.title: June 27th, 2025 09:40
item.description: Today, I shall mostly be listening to Lalo Schifrin. RIP

item.title: June 17th, 2025 08:39
item.description: I’ve begun a bit of a fiction project. Who knows if it’ll ever see the light of day. I suspect I’ll fall into the trap of doing a lot of worldbuilding at the expense of creating an actual story, but hey, it’s mostly for my own amusement. Don’t hold your breath.

item.title: June 11th, 2025 10:43
item.description: Heh, going through old playlists, and adding them to my sounds lists. This may take a while.

item.title: June 9th, 2025 12:53
item.description: Oh good grief. I have spent a long time today refactoring the way that my site handles images, because I wanted to auto-process the social preview images. I’m not sure it’s worth it… Time for a spot of lunch.

item.title: Mellow'n'collie
item.description:
I made a playlist with a mix of old and new tracks in a sort of slightly melancholy, chill vibe. Though I had high hopes for the new Stereolab album, it all feels a bit samey. Aerial Troubles is the stand-out track.

This acts as a bit of a diary entry too - we went to stay at a nice campsite, near Banham Zoo. (All the G family love a zoo). On the Saturday was a little bring-your-own-dog dog show, and our Jack Russell Terrorist won the scurry race! So proud.

item.title: June 5th, 2025 09:24
item.description: Trying something new. I made a playlist, as a form of diary entry…

item.title: June 4th, 2025 13:48
item.description:
Oh my goodness. That took a lot of work, I’d really screwed up in many ways. Broke the Hugo templates; Had simply missed a whole swathe of image references I’d imported from elsewhere AND went down a very fruitful Obsidian / Dataview rabbit hole üï≥ üêá

  • Must write up a post about Obsidian & Dataview as a CMS for Hugo.

All done now, as far as I can tell.

item.title: June 3rd, 2025 09:48
item.description:
Oh good grief. Just found that the alt text part of the site has broken. I’m not sure how long it’s been like this. Fixing!

via GIPHY

item.title: June 2nd, 2025 - 5:22pm
item.description: Hmm, turns out I’m having “ideas” again, which often results in site breakages. Not helped by the fact that Hugo has announced potentially breaking changes in the templating systemgohugo.io - I’m going to try an upgrade and see what happens… wish me luck.

item.title: June 2nd, 2025 - 9:58am
item.description: I honestly thought I was going to write many more short things, and I’ve over complicated this. So, I spent some time today under complicating it.
